Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw and label how sound travels from one student to the other through the string.
The student can show the materials used in the string telephone, such as cups and string, and how they help in communication.
The student can include details that demonstrate how the design of the string telephone allows for communication, like the tautness of the string.
The student can depict how this device solves the problem of communicating over long distances without modern technology.
The student can show an understanding that the string telephone is an example of using sound to send and receive information.
